content: When there's something worth celebrating, like meeting you, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, I can do {A庆祝}this! Get floofalicious, and jump!

content: {A笑眯眯}Am I seeing things, baa? My Planette seems to have grown bigger! I learned a new Reaction recently while playing with the plushies — <style=Highlight>Celebrate</style>!

content: Feels like there's a thread tethering us, maa. {A一愣}Anyway, I want to celebrate every single day of living here with you!

content: Baa-mm, it's indeed something worth celebrating!~ However... why do we always fall back to the planet's surface, no matter how high we jump?
